Package dev.gamekit.core

Class Window

java.lang.Object
dev.gamekit.core.Window
public final class Window extends Object
Singleton class which manages the JFrame the application is rendered in

    • setResolution

      public static void setResolution(Window.Resolution resolution)
      Sets the resolution of the Window before starting the application

      After the Window instance is created, this method does nothing

      Parameters:
      resolution - The resolution of the window

    • setFullscreen

      public static void setFullscreen(boolean fullscreen)
      Sets whether the Window should launch in full screen or in windowed mode

      After the Window instance is created, this method does nothing

      Parameters:
